Web Application Development

Course Code:ITM 1131
Course Level:Year One,Semester One
Credit Unit:4

Course Description

This course introduces students to web Technologies=HTML CSS,JavaScript;CSS frameworks; frameworks.Students will learn to implement modern web pages using HTML and CSS framework.The course also introduces students to full stack web application programming using JavaScript.

Course Objectives

  1. Describe web technologies(HTML,CSS&JavaScript),CSS frameworks,and JavaScript frameworks.
  2. Implement a simple but modern web page with HTML and CSS.
  3. Build a simple but functional web application using JavaScript.

Indicate Course Outline

Week Topic Sub-topics Hours Mode of Delivery
1-3 Introduction to HTMLs programming What is HTML?History of HTML;Anatomy of an HTML ;Structure of HTML Document;HTML content models;Heading Elements;Table;lists;HTML Character Entities;Links;Images. 6LH;12PH Online;F2F

Methods of Assessment

  • Formative assessments(Assignments,Homework):10%
  • Work-integrated Assessment(Projects,Laboratory pratical):20%
  • Summative Assessment(End of Semester Examination):50%

Reading List

  1. Carey,P.M.(2017).New Persepectives on HTMLs aand CSS3,Comprehesive,cengage Learning.
  2. Felke-Morris,T.(2019).Web Development and Design Foundations with HTMLs.Persons.
